original_text: They enjoy the music of tambourines and harps. They sing with joy to the sound of flutes. They enjoy the music of tambourines and harps.
korean_text: 그들은 소고와 수금으로 노래하고 피리 불어 즐기며

sentences.original_text: They enjoy the music of tambourines and harps
They sing with joy to the sound of flutes
They enjoy the music of tambourines and harps
